```{r}
# Formulate and Solve the model in R
#  Objective Function:
#   Min TC = 622x A1 + 614x A2 + 630x A3 + 641x B1 + 645x B2 + 649x B3

# Production Capacity:
#  x A1 + x A2 + x A3 ≤ 100
#  x B1 + x B2 + x B3 ≤ 120

# Demand:
#  x A1 + x B1 ≥ 80
#  x A2 + x B2 ≥ 60
#  x A3 + x B3 ≥ 70

# Non-Negativity:
	# x ij ≥ 0 for i = A,B and j = 1,2,3

# Answer:
#  x A1 = 0, x A2 = 60, x A3 = 30, x B1 = 80, x B2 = 0, x B3 = 40
```



```{r}
library(lpSolve)

costs <- matrix(c(622, 614, 630,   
                  641, 645, 649),  
                ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)

row.signs <- rep("<=", 2)
row.rhs <- c(100, 120)   

col.signs <- rep(">=", 3)
col.rhs <- c(80, 60, 70) 

trans <- lp.transport(costs, "min", row.signs, row.rhs, col.signs, col.rhs)

trans$solution
trans$objval
```
